lyrics.text:
Si’i Sīsū ē, ka kovi hoku vaka,
‘I he folau ki he fonua na,
‘E fa’a tokoni mai ko
ā
ha taha?
Ko Koe pē.

Neongo e lelei ʻemau feohi,
Neongo ai pē ‘enau lau tokon
i
;
Ka ‘oka faingata’a ko hai ‘e ofi?
Ko Koe pē.

‘Oku nau taki taha ha kavenga,
Mo taki taha hano faingata’a,
Ko Koe pē te ke ‘i ai ke ala;
Ko Koe pē.

Ko Koe pē ka lolo hoku hama,
Ko Koe ka mahae hoku lā,
Ko Koe ai pē ka alangavakā,
Ko Koe pē.

Ko Koe te u falala ai he ‘aho,
Ko Koe te ta leʻo ‘i he pō.
Ko Koe ‘i he houhou mo e namo,
Ko Koe pē.

Ko hai mo Koe ‘i he fusi taula?
Ko hai mo Koe ‘oka hou fonua?
He laolao pea mo e taufa?
Ko Koe pē.
